Package org.elasticsearch.common.util

Class LongHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.util.LongHash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Releasable

    public final class LongHash
extends java.lang.Object
    Specialized hash table implementation similar to BytesRefHash that maps long values to ids. Collisions are resolved with open addressing and linear probing, growth is smooth thanks to BigArrays and capacity is always a multiple of 2 for faster identification of buckets. This class is not thread-safe.

      • get

        public long get​(long id)

      • add

        public long add​(long key)
        Try to add key. Return its newly allocated id if it wasn't in the hash table yet, or -1-id if it was already present in the hash table.
